title: I Bought A $39 Laptop From Amazon...
description: The Coolest Phone You've Never Heard Of...   Craig Wireless Netbook (USA Link) -  Craig Wireless Netbook (International) -   I had hopes that this $39 laptop may exceed expectations (considering the price point). Turns out I received a lemon. Several keys on the keyboard did not function eliminating my opportunity to properly test it. The entire user interface was bizarre and the entire experience was reminiscent of a previous technology era (rightfully so, the manufacture date on this laptop is 2012). I would steer clear of this laptop even at $39 on Amazon.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
